attributes.action: P.P.I. deadline. Make the banks do the leg work to repay mis-sold PPI.
attributes.additional_details: Why is the onus on the customer to chase/pay a claim company to reclaim PPI rather than the Banks responsibility to re-pay what is owed? Make the banks do the leg work!
attributes.background:
1. Some people who have been wrongly sold PPI maybe don't have the financial records/economic knowledge to find out. 
2. Why should the wronged customer pay commission to a third party.
4. We are forced to bail them out when they collapse, what do we get for our money - screwed.

rejection.details:
This would be a matter for the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA), which is independent of the Government and Parliament. You can contact the FCA here:

https://www.fca.org.uk/contact
